script.name: !fight.attack.enemies
script.description: Attack enemies in range and land if none there

line.comment: * ZH 1.9 - Terraformer owned ships do not attack Terraformer made ships
* ZH 1.10 - Player owned OCV ships do not attack Terraformer made ships
* we can already return null if the closest ship is out of range

sval.val: Attack enemies in range and land if none there
ZH 1.9 - Terraformer owned ships do not attack Terraformer made ships
ZH 1.10 - Player owned OCV ships do not attack Terraformer made ships
we can already return null if the closest ship is out of range
